title: pocketmine 开服脚本无法运行
author: wolski
txt_content:
[root@MyServer pocket]# ./start.sh
./bin/php5/bin/php: error while loading shared libraries: libssl.so.1.0.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory何解？

replies.author: 西瓜太郎
replies.txt_content:
PHP文件下载了没？
http://sourceforge.net/projects/pocketmine/files/
去官方的教程最详细了
https://github.com/PocketMine/Po ... Server#wiki-windows
